main module¶

main.add_user_action(email, action_key, file_name, upload_time)¶

The following function modifies the user actions that are being peformed and called on the react front end server It is called when the user already exists and additional information is appended upon existing information

Parameters:
  • file_name – name of the image that is being uploaded
  • email – email queried for user
  • action_key – the key that corresponds to the filtering being done
  • upload_time – stores the time at which the image was uploaded
Returns:
main.create_user(email, image_name, upload_time)¶

The following method creates a user with default variables if the user being queried does not already exist.

Parameters:
  • email – email queried for user
  • image_name – name of image
  • upload_time – stores the time at which the user uploads ttheir image
Returns:
main.filter_image(email, action_key, file_name, vcm_image, start_time)¶

The following function queries for the email address of the user, filters the image based on the action_key given, computes the latency of the filtering option and then returns the filtered image

Parameters:
  • email – email of the user to be queried
  • file_name – name of the image that is being uploaded
  • action_key – the number designating the filtering option
  • vcm_image – the image that is stored on the path of the vcm
  • start_time – the time at which the latency calculations begin
Returns:

filtered_image: returns the filtered image from filterings.py
